extendedInfo.description: HUD Homes is your source for Government Foreclosures. The database of liquidation properties, real estate listings, and homes for sale offered on the HUD Homes app consists of Government foreclosures for sale, known as HUD properties. HUD properties are often sold considerably below their market value, making them a great deal for buyers. HUD stands for Department of Housing and Urban Development (US government). A HUD property is a residential property acquired by HUD as a result of a foreclosure action on an FHA-insured mortgage. The HUD Homes app is the first ever Android app to offer access to HUD properties exclusively. The HUD Homes app has a nationwide HUD properties data feed and a Property Condition Report on nearly every HUD property on the app.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: One of the best apps in the play store to search for a home. Very convenient to have and easy to use. Has been very informative and helpful in my search for a new home in my area. Would recommend to all who are reading this.
reviews.author: Megan Gosnell

reviews.title: Good price range
reviews.comment: Got good range of homes at quite reasonable prices.
reviews.author: Mohammad Dunaway

reviews.title: Very helping
reviews.comment: I made lot of research on the market and finally found this app that solved my almost problems related to\302\240buying\302\240home.

reviews.title: making great deals
reviews.comment: app consist of wide information for the Government foreclosures and making great deals for buyers by offering property below the market value.

reviews.title: Should be 0 stars
reviews.comment: Broken as heck. Makes me register every other viewing, even in saved properties. Over and over. I saved houses, and when I went back and clicked on them, it brought up a completely different property that wasn\'t even related to the one saved. Nothing but a information fishing waste of time.

reviews.title: Tried app but failed to meet basic requirements.

reviews.title: False advertising
reviews.comment: 90% of the homes on here have been off the market for MONTHS. The house I bought 3 months ago states that it was \"just added\" and available

reviews.title: Crashes and doesn\'t remember anything!
reviews.comment: Everytime you look at a property you have to give your email, phone, and password, yet no option to actually login or remember it.  No option to forward to a friend.  Lot\'s of room for improvements!

reviews.title: Not what I expected.
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t work that great and is slow. Much faster to just go to the hud website in browser. - Mikey M.
